p: Drawing the magnetization curve ( M-H curve) for different preparation of IONPs (different size, shape, etc.) is useful to study the link between magnetic and physical properties. This is generally done by means of VSM or SQUID [ 66]. High M s is an important parameter for characterizing IONPs, which is typically is measured in emu∙g −1, mainly depends on the chemical composition of NPs. Low values of coercive field H c , measured in Oe, together with the remnant magnetization M r , are other important indicators of emerging superparamagnetic properties.
